input_text:
Job Title: Project Engineer

Location: Tucson, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
If you are looking for a place to grow your career and make a difference – RICK is the place for you! As a Project Engineer in Tucson, AZ you will have an opportunity to work with a multi-disciplinary team on meaningful, landmark projects in the Tucson region. As a RICK team member, you will help clients and communities turn their dreams into reality. You will learn from and work alongside industry-leading experts and together shape the future of tomorrow. At RICK you will find an abundance of opportunities for mentorship, growth, and (of course) fun! Learn more by visiting www.rickengineering.com

Qualifications

Qualified candidates will have a BSCE degree (preferred) and 5-10 years’ experience or the equivalent work experience of four (6) years in land development and/or public works. Registration as an Engineer-in-Training is required with registration as a Professional Engineer is preferred.

Completed Coursework In The Following Areas Desired

Transportation and highway engineeringHydrology and hydraulicsGeotechnical engineeringSurveying


Experience Must Include

Ability to take plans from conceptual design to final plansPreparation and processing of plans for commercial and/ residential land development projects, including roadway, utility, grading and drainage design.Knowledge of jurisdictional codes, standards and procedures in the Tucson Area is preferred.


CAD/Civil3D Experience Is Required.

A good driving record is required.

What We Offer

Additional compensation offered with overtime and bonus potential. Generous Benefits PackageMedical, Dental, Vision, Profit Sharing, 401K, and Life and Disability Insurance and Personal LeaveHoliday Parties, Team Building Activities and Company Events 


Rick Engineering Company is an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action Employer

Rick's employees are protected by laws designed to protect employees from discrimination on the bases of race, religion, color, sex, pregnancy, gender identity, sexual orientation, parental status, national origin, age, disability, family medical history or genetic information, political affiliation, military service, or any other non-merit based factor. These protections extend to all management practices and decisions, including recruitment and hiring practices, appraisal systems, promotions, and training and career development programs. Rick's employees are also protected against retaliation if they engage in a protected activity, whistleblowing, or the exercise of any appeal or grievance right provided by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Project Engineer
output_json.summary: Join RICK, a leading engineering firm, as a Project Engineer in Tucson, AZ. Work on landmark projects, learn from industry experts, and contribute to shaping the future.

Help clients and communities turn their dreams into reality.
Learn from and work alongside industry-leading experts.

Generous benefits package including medical, dental, vision, profit sharing, 401K, life and disability insurance, and personal leave.
Holiday parties, team building activities, and company events.

These protections extend to all management practices and decisions, including recruitment and hiring practices, appraisal systems, promotions, and training and career development programs. Rick's employees are also protected against retaliation if they engage in a protected activity, whistleblowing, or the exercise of any appeal or grievance right provided by law.
